comment: Loved her! Thats all that I have to say. Dr, Blalock cares!

Super easy class. 3 tests (2 attempts on each), 1 quiz, 2 discussion, 16 smartbooks and connect assignments, and a group project. The group project is pretty easy if you get a good group. She offers a super easy extra credit assignment worth 75 points. The whole class is out of 1,000 points, so this can help you out a lot.

Great professor, due dates were super straightforward for all assignments.There were a couple of essays, a Group Project (2 parts), discussions, and tests.Assignments were due weekly on the same day.However, she actually reads what you submit, taking longer to grade your written assignments - Just be patient and she will return your written work.
rating_tags: Group projects--Gives good feedback--So many papers

comment: 2 attempts for every quiz/test that are super straightforward and directly from the book. Group project graded fairly. Overall, very organized and easy.

TAKE HER. Works with students even with online course. 3 tests (50 questions, 2 attempts, 2nd attempt only answer wrong questions.) 16 connect quizzes, 1 case study, and a group project. Super easy if all assignments are completed.
Professor Blalock is very clear in her grading policies. You log in, do the work, submit the grade. Thats as easy as it gets! A few short essays and tests but nothing crazy by any means!

Course expectations were clear.  Group project was not bad if you get a good group- she assigns the group. 2 parts, 1st part due at mid point, 2nd at end of semester.  4 discussion post and 5 test. Read the chapters and you should do well. She seems very passionate about the subject, the course is well organized, and she is active and responsive.
rating_tags: Group projects--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Dr. Blalock was awesome - really. I have no negative words to say about her, and thats saying a lot because I always seem to find fault in the structure of a class or the accessibility of a professor. She was so available and willing to help, and the assignments arent challenging. No tests, only quizzes. Totally recommend.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Best professor I have taken in college. She cares about her students and wants to see them be successful. Her classes are fun to go to. THERE ARE ZERO TESTS!!! Group project is broken up into two parts and is not very hard. TAKE HER!

I took Management and Behavioral Science. She doesn't post lectures, so the information may not really get in your head. Pretty quick feedback, but I would characterize the class by the group project (I'm not a fan of group projects). Simple class, but read the textbook or you will not pass the quizzes, they are VERY long!

Super easy chill online class! NO TESTS! there are only 5 total quizzes all multiple choice and can be easily found. There is a group project which wasnt to hard my group just SUCKED! but even then super easy class !
